name.en: Research of Kunqu musicology and score
name.ch: 崑曲曲學與曲譜專題研究

goal.ch:
1、認識崑曲曲學的名義、概念與發展。
2、了解崑曲曲學研究的進程與現況。
3、研討崑曲曲譜的重要作品、歷史、編纂者、編纂方法、體例、內容。
4、從崑曲曲譜觀點、方法與內容差異，研討明清曲學的論題與發展。
5、研讀曲學理論重要著作。
goal.en:
1. Understand the name, concept and development of Kunqu Opera.
2. Understand the process and current situation of Kunqu Opera research.
3. Study the important works, history, compilers, compilation methods, styles and contents of Kunqu opera scores.
4. Discuss the topics and development of opera studies in the Ming and Qing Dynasties from the perspective of Kunqu opera scores, methods and content differences.
5. Study important works on music theory.

outline.ch:
1、第一週：課程說明：崑曲曲學定義、範疇
2、第二週：崑曲曲學研究的歷史與現況
3、第三週：曲學名作選讀（一）：《南詞引正》、《度曲須知》
4、第四週：曲學名作選讀（二）：《曲律》
5、第五週：崑曲曲譜概說：類型、歷史、功能與作法
6、第六週：從「牌名譜」到蔣孝《舊編南九宮譜》
7、第七週：沈璟與《增定南九宮曲譜》專題（一）：觀點、體例、作法
8、第八週：沈璟與《增定南九宮曲譜》專題（二）：相關研究議題研討
9、第九週：沈自晉《南詞新譜》專題：從新曲到定律、相關研究議題研討
10、第十週：鈕少雅《南曲九宮正始》專題（一）：文獻、輯佚與定律方法
11、第十一週：鈕少雅《南曲九宮正始》專題（二）：相關研究議題研討
12、第十二週：《南詞定律》專題：官修曲譜與俗唱的對話、工尺譜議題研討
13、第十三週：《九宮大成南北詞宮譜》專題
14、第十四週：崑曲折子戲工尺譜：《吟香堂》、《納書楹》到近代崑曲曲譜
15、第十五週：曲學名作選讀（三）：《顧曲麈談》、《曲學通論》
16、第十六週：曲學名作選讀（四）：《螾廬曲談》
17、第十七週：曲學名作選讀（五）：《曲律易知》
18、第十八週：期末論文發表與講評
outline.en:
1. Week 1: Course description: Definition and scope of Kunqu Opera
2. Week 2: History and Current Situation of Kunqu Opera Research
3. Week Three: Selected Readings of Masterpieces of Quology (1): “Nan Ci Yin Zheng“, “Instructions for Reading Qu“
4. Week 4: Selected Readings from Masterpieces of Quology (2): “Lv“
5. Week 5: Overview of Kunqu Opera Score: Type, History, Function and Practice
6. Week 6: From “Paiming Pu“ to Jiang Xiao‘s “Old Edition of Nanjiugong Pu“
7. Week 7: Special topic on Shen Jing and “Zeng Ding Nan Jiugong Music Score“ (1): Viewpoints, styles, and methods
8. Week 8: Special topic on Shen Jing and “Zeng Ding Nan Jiugong Music Score“ (2): Discussion of related research topics
9. Week 9: Special topic on Shen Zijin‘s “New Score of Southern Ci“: From new music to laws, discussion of related research topics
10、Week 10: Special topic on Niu Shaoya‘s “The Nine Palaces of Nanqu Zhengshi“ (1): Documents, collections and legal methods
11、Week 11: Special topic on Niu Shaoya‘s “The Nine Palaces of Nanqu Zhengshi“ (2): Discussion of related research topics
12、Week 12: Special topic of “The Law of Southern Ci“: dialogue between official music scores and popular singing, and discussion on Gongchi music scores
13、Week 13: Special topic on “Nine Palaces Dacheng Northern and Southern Ci Gongpu“
14、Week 14: Kunqu opera music notation: “Yinxiangtang“, “Nashu Ying“ to modern Kunqu opera music notation
15、Week 15: Selected readings of famous works of Quxue (3): “Gu Ququ Tan“, “General Theory of Quxue“
16、Week 16: Selected Readings from Masterpieces of Quology (4): “Tanlu Qutan“
17、Week 17: Selected Readings from Masterpieces of Quology (5): “Easy to Know the Rhythm of Qu“
18、Week 18: Final paper presentation and comments
